pageContent: Introduction: Phosphodiesterase type 5 inhibitor (PDE5) use is a treatment strategy for prostate cancer patients with post-radiation therapy (RT) erectile dysfunction (ED).

metaData.source:
Improving the quality of life of patients with prostate carcinoma: a randomized trial testing the efficacy of a nurse-driven intervention
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15986401/
